summary: Troubles with back slash with some characters

comments.content: This is related to issue 395. Verified that it is currently occurring.
Thanks for a quick reply. I use the r1459 version. Do you mean I should use the last one? Or did it not fixed yet?
drat, we should have added an end-to-end test for that one.
This issue was closed by revision r1627.

'r1627' doesn't exist anymore since we switched to git.

So, for future reference, this is CL 25635092 internally, and commit e85593d14461f5342013d0d6c6e8484dca003eef in the open source version. In particular, the comment that was added in that CL, in IRFactory, is a nice explanation of how we handle the \v character.
